id.description: [string]Id of this formation, (e.g. dropship). Used by squad transport component to find the specific formation.

rows.description: Number of rows that will get occupied in the dropship when spawning this squad.

columns.description: Number of columns that will get occupied in the dropship when spawning this squad.

front_priority.description: The priority when selecting which spawn is spawned closer to the front / opening.

attach_node.description: [string]Name of explicit attach node. Only required if the default should be overwritten.
